welcome_message_body: Welcome to Portmore, Jamaica! Known for its vibrant culture, beautiful beaches, and delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the charm of our city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Right's Bakery
restaurants.description: Right's Bakery is a bakery located in the city.

restaurants.name: Tai Xing Garden
restaurants.description: Tai Xing Garden is a chinese restaurant located in Portmore.
restaurants.address: Sovereign Village, Portmore, Parish of Saint Catherine

restaurants.name: Jolly's Seafood Restaurant
restaurants.description: Jolly's Seafood Restaurant is a seafood restaurant located in Portmore.
restaurants.address: Port Henderson Rd, Portmore, Parish of Saint Catherine

restaurants.name: Port henderson
restaurants.description: Port henderson is a caribbean restaurant located in Portmore.

restaurants.name: Little Shang Hai Town Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.description: Little Shang Hai Town Restaurant & Bar is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norman Manley Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Norman Manley Airport services flights within Jamaica.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
